casebody.data:
Emil HRABAK v. Fred E. HUMMEL, Trustee for Monark Motor Freight System, Incorporated, a Bankrupt, Appellant. No. 8572. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Argued May 5, 1944. Decided May 8, 1944. Ward C. Henry, of Philadelphia, Pa. (Swartz, Campbell & Henry, of Philadelphia, Pa., on the brief), for appellant. Philip A. Campbell, of Philadelphia, Pa. (Frey & Campbell, of Philadelphia, Pa., on the brief), for appellee.

Before JONES and GOODRICH, Circuit Judges, and GANEY, District Judge.

PER CURI AM.

The judgment of the District Court, 55 F.Supp. 775, is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Bard.
